title: Cable beanie
description: This cable beanie knitting pattern features intricate, textured cable stitches that create a cozy and stylish design. The pattern guides you through knitting the hat in the round, using a combination of twisted stitches to form beautiful braided cables
materials: 450 grams of worsted (medium) weight wool yarn
instructions: Step 2. For ribbing, do k2 p2 and repeat until desired length
Step 3. For body, do k6 p6, k2 p6
